Package org.com.model.repository

Klasse UserRepository

java.lang.Object
org.com.model.repository.AbstractRepository
org.com.model.repository.UserRepository
public class UserRepository extends AbstractRepository
Repository for user-related database operations. Extends AbstractRepository to leverage standard transaction handling.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Umut

    • getUserByName

      public User getUserByName(String username)
      Retrieves a user by their username.
      Parameter:
      username - Username to search for
      Gibt zurück:

    • authenticateUser

      public User authenticateUser(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a user by username and password.
      Parameter:
      username - User's username
      password - User's password
      Gibt zurück:
      Authenticated user or null if authentication fails
